scripts.build: npm run wasm:build && mv build/brushlib.js build/brushlib-loader.js && npm run build:concat && rm build/brushlib-loader.js
scripts.build:concat: cat src/umd_header build/brushlib-loader.js src/brushlib.js src/umd_footer >> build/brushlib.js
scripts.wasm:common: emcc src/main.c -I src/libmypaint -o build/brushlib.js -Wall -Wbad-function-cast -Wcast-function-type -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_init', '_stroke_to', '_reset_brush', '_set_brush_base_value', '_set_brush_mapping_n', '_set_brush_mapping_point', '_new_brush']" -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -s RESERVED_FUNCTION_POINTERS=2 -s NO_FILESYSTEM=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS="['addFunction','ccall','cwrap']"
